subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Gregory Bourdy tapped in for par on the third extra hole and won the Estoril Open in Cascais, Portugal. Bourdy, Alastair Forsyth and David Howell were tied at 18-under 266 after four rounds, with Bourdy carding a seven-under par 64 to pull into a tie and set up the playoff. It was Bourdy’s second European Tour title.
